content.text:
# 10th Critics' Choice Awards

| last_link = 9th Critics' Choice Awards
| last      = 9th
| next_link = 11th Critics' Choice Awards
| next      = 11th
| network   = The WB
}}
The '''10th Critics' Choice Awards' were presented on January 10, 2005, at The Wiltern in Los Angeles, California, honoring the finest achievements of 2004 filmmaking. The ceremony was hosted by Eric McCormack and broadcast live on The WB. The nominees were announced on December 15, 2004.
Top 10 films
(in alphabetical order)
* The Aviator
* Collateral
* Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
* Finding Neverland
* Hotel Rwanda
* Kinsey
* Million Dollar Baby
* The Phantom of the Opera
* Ray
* Sideways
Winners and nominees
, Best Director winner]]
, Best Actor winner]]
, Best Actress winner]]
, Best Supporting Actor winner]]
, Best Supporting Actress winner]]
, Best Young Actor winner]]
, Best Young Actress winner]]
, Best Writer co-winner]]
, Distinguished Career Achievement in Performing Arts Award winner]]

* Alexander Payne – Sideways
|-

* Lindsay Lohan – Mean Girls as Cady Heron
